title: Mimi Fox, 2006
teaser: Guitarist Mimi Fox is a rising star and a champion of the jazz guitar tradition. With amazing chops and crystal clear tone, Fox is equally at home playing bebop or ballads.  Her compositional skills shine on her tune, "Perpetually Hip," and with McPartland and bassist Gary Mazzaroppi, Fox tears up the fretboard on "What Is This Thing Called Love?"
